summary:
I dont think there\'s a single one of us who didnt try to kill guards for whatever were his reasons.
And so,I present you this small mod that gives a a fully craftable set of armor,made from your fellow
guards.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
I dont think there\'s a single one of us who didnt try to kill guards for whatever were his reasons.
And so,I present you this small mod that gives a a fully craftable set of armor,made from your fellow
guards.

Aswell this mod adds to the regular guards gloves,and boots of a uniqe color for each hold.Except solitude guard,for those new boots and gloves only can be fount in Solitude blacksmith.

(To get this working,however you might need to wait few days in isolated place,or start a new save,as with other guard-changing outfit mods).

To craft your armor you will need various different pieces of guard armor and other small ingridients.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: To be first able to craft your dark armor you will have to find Maniac\'s note 
somewhere inside barraks of whiterun.

Installation:Simply put everything from Data folder to your Data folder.

Compability:This mod will most likeley will not be compatable with other guard-changing outfit mods,(and it is not reccomended to change theirs outfit to get the armor).
author: Bermel
